pullRequest.title: Inherit snapshot id and sequence number in entries metadata table
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR migrates the entries metadata table to DataTask so that we can inherit snapshot ids and sequence numbers.

commit.message: Inherit snapshot id and sequence number in entries metadata table

nodes.bodyText: Github renders it weirdly but I squashed two tests into 1 and made modifications on top.
I need this for the projection while reading manifest entries.
